column3: Heard  the  submissions  of both  counsels.  When  we  peruse  the  court

column2: record we find  that the trial Judge had complicated the matter by combining
both cases together.  We  find  the law especially the Criminal Procedure Code
the  Judicator  Act  does  not  permit  combining  of  trials  against
accused  persons  at the  High  Court.  In  this  case  the  matter  is  much  worse
